title: Transmission 001: On The Event Horizon
lore: Reality fractures at the edge of collapse. Sound distorts time. Memory loops through magnetic tape. This inaugural transmission captures the instant before surrender — when analog gods rise, spectral signals drift, and fractured frequencies echo from the abyss. Welcome to the threshold. This is where the myth begins.
